summary: MHA matchup please? straight female. Stubborn. Hard-headed. Sarcastic. Witty. Clingy. Moody. Restless. Doesn't exactly pay the...
question: MHA matchup please? straight female. Stubborn. Hard-headed. Sarcastic. Witty. Clingy. Moody. Restless. Doesn't exactly pay the best attention when she should at times. Huge perfectionist when it comes to things she cares about. Lazy. Curious when it comes to things that interests her. Dramatic. Infp Taurus. Enneagram tri-type: 147. Dancer. Anime lover. Crime show lover. Bookworm. Fan-girl. Can't stand pushy people and fake people. Goofy ball of sunshine for the most part. Laid-back. Thanks!
answer:
Hello! I think I remember you requesting something from me before lol

I match you with…

Denki Kaminari!

Denki is vERY laidback and not pushy at all. He can also be kinda lazy, so you two will have a lot of days where you just chill out together. He loves how sunny you are, he thinks that it’s adorable! He will totally tease you about being a nerd but you can retaliate easily because he’s also a huge nerd. 


I hope you liked your matchup! - Mod Bunny

Requests are open!

summary: Okay but imagine the reader being a punlord and chills with the lov. And reader is like "When Shigaraki says "You gonna catch...
question: Okay but imagine the reader being a punlord and chills with the lov. And reader is like "When Shigaraki says "You gonna catch these hands" someone gonna be catching more than two" or "Don't spell part backwards, it's a trap" or something like that (that's kinda so me, I love puns)
answer:
🎱You had come to be the most hated and loved member of the LOV. Whenever you decided to swing by everyone knew it wouldn’t be boring, but they also knew that they would be cringing at the end of the night.

🎱Surprisingly, when you decided to swing by recently everything was calm. You were lounging about on the couch next to Spinner and Toga when Dabi and Shigaraki got into an argument. You didn’t want to get involved. Really, you didn’t. But when Shigaraki jumped to his feet with a hand outstretched as a threat, silence settling in the group, it snapped.

🎱”When Shigaraki says ‘you gonna catch these hands’ someone’s gonna be catching more than two,” you mumbled into your arms. You tried to be quiet and considerate but it was too late. Toga stifled a laugh and Shigaraki slowly, ever so slowly turned his head to look at you with those menacing red eyes. 

🎱”Uh, y’know what? I think I hear my…oven on. I hear my oven is on? Yes,” no one could catch you before you sprinted out to avoid your inevitable death.

🎱Then there was the one time Shigaraki brought up working with the Yakuza and the Eight Expendables, and you happened to be there. You didn’t particularly agree with it, no one did. But your reasons may have possibly differed slightly. While the members brought up how they were just trash you instead had to just set up for another pun in an inappropriate moment.

🎱”They say as long as we play our part-”

🎱”Woah woah woah, Shigaraki, did you say part? Don’t spell it backwards, cause it’s a trap,” you laughed at your own joke, and once again Shigaraki had to be actively held back from trying to murder you.

🎱Then there was the time you were reading a paper next to Dabi for a mission. “Y’know, I would tell you a pun…” you trailed off, and you could feel Dabi tense up next to you, “but it would be tearable,” you ripped your paper as you said it, grinning and elbowing the scarred man. One says, if you looked close enough you could actually see his soul leave his body. 

🎱Twice however, lives for your puns. To this day you both can’t figure out why everyone leaves when you two get together? Maybe his suit stinks? Who knows. But you both have a punderful time.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Dick Too Bomb
description:
by KTG

Katsuki had always wondered what had happened to Eijirou after the Fight.

He’d wondered, but the redhead had never bothered to contact him after things blew over. Three years, and not a single. Fucking. Word. So, he’d written Eijirou off as the one fan-fucking-tastic example of why he never let people close and built his emotional walls back up, twice as high as before and three times as thick.

That all changed when Eijirou found out that Katsuki was working at a local formal gift shop to make end’s meet. Turned out being a pro hero with a flashy quirk didn’t matter if Katsuki’s attitude was shit. A shit attitude was keeping him from making a comfortable living, but like hell was he gonna bend to anyone else’s will.

Well, that was until Eijirou offered Katsuki a job at his fashion design firm. And, fuck. Katsuki needed the cash, so he accepted.

He’d expected the awkward conversations and angst, even figured he’d become a pining mess at some point, but what he hadn’t expected was for Eijirou to learn his deepest, darkest secret–and then love him all the more for it.

Words: 2505, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

summary: Could you do one where katsuki gets braces and doesn’t want anyone to know so he just doesn’t talk but his s/o accidentally lets...
question: Could you do one where katsuki gets braces and doesn’t want anyone to know so he just doesn’t talk but his s/o accidentally lets out the secret (btw the way he brushes his teeth is not healthy🙂)
answer:
this a little short but sweet hehe

hope you enjoy

“Dude don’t you think that Bakugou is acting a little… odd?”

Kaminari whispered into the ear of his raven haired friend, the two eyeing the ash blonde from across the room as they had their private conversation.

“I was thinking the same thing, he’s abnormally quiet today. He’s barely given anyone a death threat. Something is weird.”

The two bros continued to stare at the unusually quiet ash blonde. Watching as his girlfriend approached his desk, sharing a smile with her lover and poking his cheek, earning a smack to her hand from the male.

“Man, Bakugou is so lucky to have a cute girl like (y/n) as his girlfriend… I wish I had a cute girl to poke my cheeks. So unfair!” the electric blonde whined. You exchanged a farewell to your boyfriend and retreated to your seat, which was the desk in front of Kaminari. Once you sat down, the electric boy took the chance to ask you the question that had been plaguing him and his friend’s mind all morning.

“Hey (y/n) what’s up with Bakugou?”

You tilted your head in confusion, “What do you mean?” you questioned.

“Well it’s just that he seems… quiet? I mean- it’s so uncharacteristic for Bakugou. Usually his voice is the main thing you hear in this classroom.” the ravenette added in.

“Yeah! and he hasn’t even insulted Midoriya once! Is he sick or something?!”

You giggled at their silly assumptions. You knew exactly why he was acting like this, due to the appointment he had over the weekend and you being the first person he visited after the long grueling hours he spent at the dentist to complain about the pain in his mouth. And, of course, to cuddle the pain away in your arms.

“Wow it’s surprising you’re actually concerned about Bakugou despite the way he treats you- but don’t worry it’s nothing serious. He just got braces is all-”

“Oi (y/n).”

The deep gruff voice of your lover hung over you. Slowly turning around you were met with Bakugou’s intense glare, his form holding a threatening aura as it loomed over you dangerously.

‘Shit…’

You had forgotten all about your promise to keep his braces a secret.

“Didn’t I tell you to keep these ‘thupid braces a secret.”

Inaudibly, you choked on the unintentional lisp in his words. It took everything in you, when he first spoke, to not laugh at the new way of speaking. He almost blew you out of the room when you did so much as a snicker. It would definitely take some time to getting used to.

“Dude you got braces?!”

“Yeah? And what about it ‘thitface”

You choked again.

“ ‘thop laughing (y/n)!!!”

“Whoa dude you got a lisp” Sero covered his mouth trying to suppress his giggles. But the way his shoulders quivered it gave him away.

“I’ll kill you, you athhaths!!!”

This time you burst out into laughter the two other males followed, and soon enough the rest of the class joined in on the commotion.

“Wow Kacchan you have braces! They look pretty good on you.”

“ ‘thut up nerd!”

“It was nice to have Bakugou so quiet though, but now I guess he’s back to his old self, ribbit.”

“Guess Bakugou is starting to lose his bite.”

“I’LL KILL ALL OF YO-”

A loud snap echoed through the room and in a split second the ash blonde started screaming.

“God! Fucking- OW!!!”

It seemed like the rubberband in his mouth had snapped. The angry blonde was wincing in pain and clutching onto his cheek.

“For fucks sake! That hurt like ‘thit!!! Fuck these fucking rubber bands ‘thit!!!”

“These braces might just do more than just help your teeth. Maybe it’ll finally teach you how to shut your mouth Bakugou.” the monotone voice of the familiar heterochromatic classmate spoke.

“ ‘thut up half-and-half bastard, before I-”

*snap*

“FUCK!!!!”

“Katsuki close your mouth!!!”
answer_abstract:
this a little short but sweet hehe

hope you enjoy

Kaminari whispered into the ear of his raven haired friend, the two eyeing the ash blonde from across the room as they had their private conversation.

“I was thinking the same thing, he’s abnormally quiet today. He’s barely given anyone a death threat. Something is weird.”

The two bros continued to stare at the unusually quiet ash blonde. Watching as his girlfriend approached his desk, sharing a smile with her lover and poking his cheek, earning a smack to her hand from the male.

“Man, Bakugou is so lucky to have a cute girl like (y/n) as his girlfriend… I wish I had a cute girl to poke my cheeks. So unfair!” the electric blonde whined. You exchanged a farewell to your boyfriend and retreated to your seat, which was the desk in front of Kaminari. Once you sat down, the electric boy took the chance to ask you the question that had been plaguing him and his friend’s mind all morning.

“Hey (y/n) what’s up with Bakugou?”

(Previously Breedersgirlfriend) 
My name's Megan. I'm a writer, video editor, artist and cosplayer. I love Danganronpa, the Tales of series, Phoenix Wright, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Nier, Final Fantasy XV, the list goes on. I love to chat, and I also love to draw, so if you're looking for conversation, or a commission, feel free to send an ask or message!
